description: Main application component for notes organizer, managing layout and state orchestration, including notes list, editor, and service interactions.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component managing notes' UI and interactions

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Initialize a new note for creation

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Open the editor for the selected note

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Delete the note with specified ID

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Save a new or existing note through the service
